title: Fig pecan cake with buttermilk icing
ingredients: ['Cake', '250g plain flour', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '1 teaspoon ground allspice', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '3 eggs', '300g caster sugar', '240ml vegetable oil', '240ml buttermilk', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '2 teaspoons hot water', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '250g tinned figs with liquid, chopped', '110g pecans', 'Buttermilk icing', '200g caster sugar', '120ml buttermilk', '1/2 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1 tablespoon golden syrup', '50g butter', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract']
